Former Mayors | Woodbridge Township, NJ


This website is AudioEye enabled and is being optimized for accessibility. To open the AudioEye Toolbar, press "shift + =". Some assistive technologies may require the use of a passthrough function before this keystroke. For more information, activate the button labeled “Explore your accessibility options”.

![](https://www.twp.woodbridge.nj.us/ImageRepository/Document?documentID=18867)


* A.P. Cranston - 1911
* J.S. Dooley - 1912
* Michael Coll - 1916
* E.W. Christie - 1922
* John D. Brechenridge - 1923-1924
* William A. Ryan - 1926-1933
* August F. Greiner - 1934-1951
* Hugh B. Quigley - 1952-1959
* Frederick Adams - 1960-1961
* Walter Zirpolo - 1962 - April 11, 1967
* Ralph Barone April - 11, - 1967-1971
* John Cassidy - 1972-1979
* Joseph DeMarino - 1980-1983
* Philip M. Cerria - 1984-1987
* Joseph DeMarino - 1988-1992
* James E McGreevey - 1993 -2002 (Sworn in as Governor on January 15, 2002)
* Brenda Y. Velasco - January 15, 2002 - January 16, 2002 (Council President is Acting Mayor)
* Frank G. Pelzman - January 17, 2002 - June 29, 2006 (passed away while holding office)
* Patricia Osborne - June 29, 2006 - July 25, 2006 (Council President serves as Acting Mayor)
* Joseph Vitale - July 25, 2006 - November 13, 2006 (appointed Interim Mayor)
* John E. McCormac - November 13, 2006 - present

1. [Mayor John E. McCormac](https://www.twp.woodbridge.nj.us/342/Mayor-John-E-McCormac)

   5. [2024 Mayoral Inauguration](https://www.twp.woodbridge.nj.us/1323/2024-Mayoral-Inauguration)
